title: What do you think about my audition video? Is there any advice? - Quora

response.answer_text: How’s your dance?? Btw: Disclaimer: [ I’m not a judge to tell you exactly how your dance is. As I myself know how to dance….. more like freestyle Dance I do at home. I also sometimes make my own dance moves. But besides that. I’m not a professional dancer or a judge. So I’m judging based on what I think. Thank you for reading:).] Ok so, here I go: I give your dance a sold 7.5 to 8.5 or 9 out of 10. Here’s why: I think your dance was really good. I liked it. It’s nice. However: first 3 seconds of the video: The moves were like a box. I don’t want to sound rude because like I told you I really like your dance. But, like the 6–8 seconds of the video was a good. But the beginning overall like the first 3 seconds was just: “ what is that?😐” I’m honest with you by the way. I’m sorry if I sound rude. I apologize if I do. But trust me I’m not. Umm…. Ahem… what was 24–26😶. Ok… 🤔…. Your dance Kind of reminded me of NCT dance moves like Kick it. Lol I’m sorry 😭💀. Overall, nice dance. It’s really good. For a person to creat their own dance is really cool. So I appreciate your effort you put in. It was good after all. So good job 👏. Also: [ I saw this question but it got deleted as soon as I finished typing my answer so I kept as a draft because I thought the question would come back up. So I’m smart for doing that😎😌. I also was toooo lazy to type it again because I was in class during my online Webex meeting lol and also answering the question. But as soon as I clicked: “ Submit.” It said: “ Question been deleted.” I’m like: “ Excuse you— WHAT?? Hell no I'm saving this as a draft!!!” Lol 💀😭. Well, that’s all I have. Have a great day:)   Edit#1: I noticed your facial expressions as well. They were ok for a person to audition. But I think if you also practice on that you can pull off good facial expressions and make your dance look good, nice.

I think it’s a solid audition! Clean and sharp moves, right on the beat, and your sense of rhythm is amazing. I do have two tips though. First thing: Your choreo a bit repetitive. I can’t distinguish each part from another because it’s all very similar. I think you might want to think about tweaking some of the choreo. Second thing: Facial expressions. You need more of that, because I don’t see any. It’s very important because what is art without expression? So work on that, and maybe also read the lyrics of the song to really understand what it’s about. I don’t care if it’s about being extremely happy or if it’s about being the best. You gotta try to figure it out, and express what you think the song’s about.
